mapper.insert: insert into db_aywarehouse (ID, CODE, NAMECN, NAMEEN, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, ORDERTYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namecn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_aywarehouse set CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMECN = #{namecn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEEN = #{nameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERTYPE = #{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, CODE, NAMECN, NAMEEN, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, ORDERTYPE from db_aywarehouse
